TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ExceptionHandlingClause extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示结构化异常处理块中的子句。

span.span: Represents a clause in a structured exception-handling block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供有关中的子句信息`try`...`catch`...`finally`The class provides information about the clauses in a `try`…`catch`…`finally` 块 (`Try`...`Catch`...`Finally`block (`Try`…`Catch`…`Finally` 在 Visual Basic 中)。in Visual Basic). 若要获取的方法中的异常处理子句的列表，请获取表示的方法。To get a list of exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a that represents the method. 使用方法来获取对象，以及如何将属性来获取子句的列表。Use the method to obtain a object, and then use the property to get the list of clauses. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. Ildasm.exe 可用于检查已编译的代码示例中，若要查看如何计算的偏移量和长度的 MSIL。You can use Ildasm.exe to examine the MSIL for the compiled code example, to see how the offsets and lengths are calculated. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类调用的构造期间对象。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CatchType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ CatchType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由此子句处理的异常类型。

span.span: Gets the type of exception handled by this clause.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示由此子句处理的异常类型，如果 属性为 或 ，则为 。

span.span: A object that represents that type of exception handled by this clause, or if the property is or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 不能将属性用于对象的当前状态。

span.span: Invalid use of property for the object's current state.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property FilterOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int FilterOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户提供的筛选代码在方法体内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 用户提供的筛选代码在方法体内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The offset within the method body, in bytes, of the user-supplied filter code.

value.span: 如果 属性具有 之外的任何值，则此属性的值没有任何意义。

span.span: The value of this property has no meaning if the property has any value other than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器子句包含用户 suppliedMicrosoft 中间语言 (MSIL)，用于确定是否由此子句处理的异常。A filter clause contains user-suppliedMicrosoft intermediate language (MSIL) that determines whether an exception is handled by this clause. 例如，包含 Visual Basic 的任何子句`When`关键字是子句。For example, any clause containing the Visual Basic `When` keyword is a clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 由于异常处理子句不是一个筛选器，因此无法获取偏移量。

span.span: Cannot get the offset because the exception handling clause is not a filter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Flags As ExceptionHandlingClauseOptions

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示此异常处理子句是 finally 子句、类型筛选的子句还是用户筛选的子句。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this exception-handling clause is a finally clause, a type-filtered clause, or a user-filtered clause.

value.span: 一个 值，它指示此子句执行何种操作。

span.span: An value that indicates what kind of action this clause performs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. public: virtual property int HandlerLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取此异常处理子句的主体的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the length, in bytes, of the body of this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 一个整数，表示形成此异常处理子句主体的 MSIL 的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the length, in bytes, of the MSIL that forms the body of this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TryLength As Integer
public: virtual property int TryLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块的总长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块的总长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个整数，表示的总长度，以字节为单位，包括此异常处理子句的 try 块。An integer that represents the total length, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property TryOffset As Integer
public: virtual property int TryOffset { int get(); };

summary.span: 包括此异常处理子句的 try 块在方法内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

value.span: 一个整数，表示包括此异常处理子句的 try 块在方法内的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the offset within the method, in bytes, of the try block that includes this exception-handling clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample`, and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象，并显示它们的属性。The property is used to obtain a list of objects and display their properties. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码是位于一个更大示例的一部分类主题。This code is part of a larger example located in the class topic. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]
